name: EELHOE Pores + Dark Spots Refining Cream with Arbutin, Niacinamide, Tranexamic Acid & Melazero | Pore-Minimizing, Gentle & Hydrating Daily Moisturizer, Suitable for Sensitive Skin, 50g (1 Pack)
short_description: 【PORES + TEXTURE TARGETING】 Refines the look of enlarged pores with a lightweight, fast-absorbing formula that helps smooth uneven texture. Designed to soften rough areas and improve clarity, the cream supports a cleaner, more refined finish without clogging or heaviness.

【DARK SPOTS + UNEVEN TONE CARE】 Addresses dullness and uneven tone by supporting a more uniform-looking complexion. Helps minimize the appearance of dark areas over time, leaving skin looking brighter, fresher, and more balanced with consistent daily use.

【ACTIVE COMPLEX WITH ARBUTIN + NIACINAMIDE + TRANEXAMIC ACID + MELAZERO】 Combines 7% Arbutin, 5% Niacinamide, 5% Tranexamic Acid, and Melazero V2 to provide a comprehensive tone-supporting system. These ingredients work in harmony to enhance clarity, maintain balance, and promote a more luminous, renewed appearance without harsh effects.

【GENTLE, HYDRATING & NON-IRRITATING FEEL】 A soft, cushiony cream that melts into the skin to deliver long-lasting hydration. The gentle formula minimizes discomfort and maintains moisture levels throughout the day, making it ideal for soothing dryness and restoring a supple, nourished feel.

【SUITABLE FOR SENSITIVE SKIN】 Created with a mindful formulation that prioritizes comfort, this cream is suitable for sensitive skin and can be used daily without overwhelming the skin barrier. Ideal for those seeking effective tone and pore care with a gentle, skin-friendly approach.

name: Olay Face Moisturizer, Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream for Women, Fragrance-Free - Anti-Aging, Anti-Wrinkle, Firming Skin Care - Triple Collagen Cream, Peptide, Hyaluronic Acid, Niacinamide, 1.7oz
short_description: OLAY REGENERIST, NEWLY UPGRADED: Now with Triple Collagen Peptide, this clinically-tested face cream for women provides deep hydration with Triple Collagen Peptide and Niacinamide, instantly plumping and firming skin for a youthful look. For a limited time, packaging may vary.

TRY BEFORE PRICEY PROCEDURES: Before considering expensive anti-aging cosmetic procedures, try this face lift cream to visibly firm skin in 1 week and improve even the deepest wrinkles in 4 weeks. No Needles. No Lasers.

POWERFUL ANTI-AGING INGREDIENTS: Clinically tested formula, with Triple Collagen Peptide, 3 powerful antioxidant peptides known to improve wrinkles and support skin's natural collagen. Also powered by Niacinamide to strengthen the skin barrier and Pro-Vitamin B5 to hydrate the skin at the cellular level.

VISIBLE RESULTS FOR AGING SKIN: Strengthens surface cellular bonds for visibly firmer, smoother, more radiant skin. Use in your daily day and night skin care routine to help restore and improve elasticity.
FRAGRANCE-FREE FACIAL MOISTURIZER: Enjoy a moisturizer that absorbs quickly, leaving no sticky residue, free of fragrance, synthetic dyes, phthalates, or parabens.

FROM THE #1 ANTI-AGING SKIN CARE BRAND: Olay, a dermatologist recommended brand, presents this wrinkle cream with hydrating and firming benefits. Experience the benefits of Olay's Regenerist line, designed to provide dramatic results without drastic measures.
product_description: Product Description Unlock the secret to timeless beauty with Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Fragrance-Free Face Cream, affectionately known as "The Red Jar." Trusted by millions and dermatologist-recommended, this luxurious, fragrance-free cream delivers visibly smoother, firmer skin from day one. Expertly formulated and clinically tested, it penetrates deeply, offering transformative hydration to reduce wrinkles and fine lines, presenting a lifted, youthful appearance. Infused with a potent blend of Triple Collagen Peptide and Niacinamide, this advanced moisturizer hydrates and revitalizes by boosting cell turnover and gently exfoliating away dullness. The result? A fresh, youthful glow that leaves you feeling as radiant as you look. Elevate your skincare routine with Olay Regenerist, which softens and firms skin, leaving it plump and beautifully rejuvenated. Experience dramatic results without resorting to expensive procedures. Why wait for a miracle when extraordinary outcomes are within reach today? Embrace Olay's Advanced Anti-Aging Collection, redefine your beauty regimen, and flaunt skin that is beautifully firm, irresistibly smooth, and naturally radiant. Say yes to the skin you love and deserve. Brand Story By

name: medicube Jelly Cream with Collagen, Niacinamide | Freeze-Dried Hydrolyzed Collagen for Skin Barrier Hydration & 24H Glow | Plumper, Firmer looking skin | 3.71 fl.oz
short_description: EVEN OUT UNEVEN SKIN TONE — Unlock the power of a transparent collagen jelly cream designed to specifically target and target uneven skin tone. Reveal a more harmonious, luminous complexion for a naturally smooth and radiant look.

PRODUCT BENEFITS — Quickly reveals a more radiant, refreshed complexion with the ‘Korean Glass Glow’ effect post-application. Dermatologist-tested, low-irritating, silicone-free, maintains a skin-friendly pH of 5.69–7.69, and is free from artificial color.

KEY INGREDIENTS — Hydrolyzed Collagen: Smaller segments enable better skin absorption, preserving firmness and elasticity. Niacinamide (Vitamin B3): Supports the skin's barrier function and boosts hydration for improved texture.

DERMATOLOGIST TESTED — Skin firmness improved by 1.793% and sagging skin by 2.488% after 24 hours. *The above information pertains only to the characters of the raw materials *Clinical Trial Tested by the Global Dermatological Research Institute.' / Results may vary depending on individual skin types.
HOW TO APPLY — Apply a quarter amount of jelly cream morning and evening to the face and décolletage (neck & chest), after using targeted serums that address your individual skin concerns.

Patch Test Recommended: Based on a Primary Skin Irritation Patch Test, Collagen Jelly Cream is suitable to use on sensitive skin. Perform a Patch Test on the body before using on the face. Proceed to using on the face if no irritation occurs in 24 hours. Consult with your doctor immediately if irritation occurs.

short_description: POWERFUL HYDRATION BOOST: For a powerful boost of hydration to the face and luminous skin, this award-winning facial moisturizer does it all. It’s packed with skin-loving ingredients that even out skin tone and replenish lost moisture for a firmed up, bouncy complexion.

NOURISHES & PLUMPS SKIN: Key ingredients include Hyaluronic Acid to help moisturize for a plump complexion, Niacinamide to minimize pores & even out skin tone, Squalane to improve balance & elasticity, and Vitamin B5 to soothe & hydrate skin.
FOR EVERYONE: Good for normal, dry, combo and oily skin types.
USE DAY & NIGHT: Great for daytime and nighttime use, the non-greasy face cream quickly sinks into the skin for a smooth, super-soft feel.
VEGAN & CRUELTY-FREE: e.l.f. stands with every eye, lip, face, paw and fin. Proudly vegan, e.l.f. is double-certified cruelty-free by Leaping Bunny & PETA.
product_description: The Holy Hydration! Face Cream is your secret weapon to a flawless face. It's packed with skin-loving ingredients to nourish your complexion. Hyaluronic Acid helps provide hydration by locking in moisture and reducing water loss. Niacinamide (Vitamin B3) helps brighten and even out skin tone. Squalane helps improve moisture balance and elasticity. Peptides help promote collagen for a more refreshed complexion. This nourishing yet lightweight cream instantly sinks into the skin for a smooth, non-greasy feel and soft, supple skin. e.l.f. makes the best of beauty accessible to every eye, lip, and face. Your originality is infinite, and we are inspired by what makes you unique. From the early explorer to the trend-obsessed beauty junkie - glam or bare faced, minimalist, maximalist and every look in between - we are for every eye, lip, and face. Proud to be 100% vegan and cruelty-free, worldwide.

short_description: 3 BLEMISH RELIEF INGREDIENTS : This cream contains a potent blend of Niacinamide and plant extracts to help reduce dark spots and blemishes. It also promotes an even skin tone, assisting you in achieving clearer and more radiant skin.

4 NOURISHING INGREDIENTS : The multi-layered cream structure formulated with Ceramide NP and Hyaluronic Acids helps restore dull skin while delivering nutrients deeply into the skin to provide continuous care by locking in moisture and nutrients.

5 SOOTHING INGREDIENTS : Care for sensitive skin and red blemishes caused by external factors with Tea Tree Leaf Water and Madecassoside. These calming ingredients can quickly help soothe your skin effectively by providing moisture.

DAILY RELIEF & SOOTHING CARE : 345 Relief Cream offers a moisturizing texture with a silky finish without any greasy feeling. Clinically tested as non-comedogenic, it is safe and gentle for acne-prone skin, making it ideal for use anytime as part of your post-acne skincare routine.

WHY CHOOSE DR.ALTHEA : Our products are free from artificial coloring, fragrance, and parabens, ensuring it is gentle on the skin. Additionally, it is Vegan-certified to meet ethical and eco-friendly standards.
